channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oracle amps up its AI bet with a plan to raise as much as $50 billion this year
Here’s what’s worth streaming in February on Netflix, Hulu, Peacock and more
Disney may soon have a new CEO. Here’s who it might be.
Oracle stock drops after plan for cloud provider to raise up to $50 billion
Nvidia’s OpenAI investment may not be as big as hoped, adding to tech jitters
Speaker Johnson: 'Confident' government shutdown will end by Tuesday
item.description: The government shut down on Saturday after Senate Democrats demanded changes to a spending package following the killings of U.S. citizens in Minnesot...

item.title: U.S. special envoy for Iraq Mark Savaya no longer in the post, sources say
item.description: Mark Savaya, named by U.S. ⁠President Donald Trump as special envoy for Iraq in October, is no longer in that role, sources familiar with the move tol...

item.title: Democrat Christian Menefee wins election for U.S. House, narrowing GOP's slim majority
item.description: Democrat Christian Menefee won a Texas U.S. House seat in a special election Saturday that will narrow Republicans' already-slim majority.

item.title: Epstein files: Ro Khanna says DOJ's latest release is 'not good enough'
item.description: The congressional Democrat said that Friday's Epstein disclosure was "significant," but it is only about half of the files that have been collected.

item.title: United Arab Emirates' 'Spy Sheikh' bought secret stake in Trump crypto company: WSJ
item.description: “This is corruption, plain and simple," said Massachusetts Sen. Elizabeth Warren, the top Democrat on the Senate Banking Committee.
